short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly Save YouTube Video Summaries to Your Obsidian Vault in Seconds!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube to Obsidian: Summaries Made Effortless!

Tired of taking notes while watching videos? Supercharge your productivity with Seed! This Chrome extension is your ultimate tool for generating quick, accurate summaries of YouTube videos in over 30 languages, saving them in Markdown right into Obsidian or any folder of your choice. Perfect for anyone looking to build their second brain, this extension combines the power of AI with a sleek, intuitive interface to give you personalized, chapter-based summaries that feel like they're straight from the creator.

Key Features:

– Summarize videos in over 30 languages
– Get summaries in bullet points or paragraph form, tailored to your needs.
– Simple, one-click setup to select your file location and let the extension do the rest in the background.
– Summaries ready in seconds for any video up to 30 minutes

Upgrade your YouTube experience and save precious time with YouTube to Obsidian – the smartest way to take notes!
